00014 BusPortsView::BusPortsView(QWidget *parent):
00015 QTableView(parent),
00016 removeAction_(tr("Remove"), this),
00017 copyAction_(tr("Copy"), this) {
00018 
00019         horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00020         horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Interactive);
00021         horizontalHeader()->setMinimumSectionSize(70);
00022

00040 void BusPortsView::keyPressEvent( QKeyEvent* event ) {
00041         // if delete was pressed
00042         if (event->key() == Qt::Key_Delete) {
00043                 emit removeItems(selectedIndexes());
00044         }
00045 
00046         // call the default implementation
00047         QTableView::keyPressEvent(event);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void BusPortsView::contextMenuEvent( QContextMenuEvent* e ) {
00051         QMenu contextMenu(this);
00052         contextMenu.addAction(&copyAction_);
00053         contextMenu.addAction(&removeAction_);
00054 
00055         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00056 
00057         // if no indexes are selected
00058         if (indexes.isEmpty())
00059                 return;
00060 
00061         contextMenu.exec(e->globalPos());
00062         e->accept();
00063 }
00064 
00065 void BusPortsView::setupActions() {
00066 
00067         connect(&removeAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00068                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069 
00070         connect(&copyAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00071                 this, SLOT(onCopy()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void BusPortsView::onRemove() {
00075         emit removeItems(selectedIndexes());
00076 }
00077 
00078 void BusPortsView::onCopy() {
00079         emit copyItems(selectedIndexes());
00080 }
00081 
00082 QModelIndexList BusPortsView::selected() const {
00083         return selectedIndexes();
